comment.body:
Just wanted to say thanks again for making Kaffiene search so clean of a template to use.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/CensoredSearch.bit
Got a visual overhaul and it looks much better now. 

I highly suggest you do the same to your search results as it's much easier on the eyes to have different sizes for the title/description with a line break.

Please don't be angry about that, I asked the guy to do it [1] because I enjoy his UI but love your index.  I'm hoping each Zite can have their own perks. I really enjoy Kaffiene's peer count system.

[1] - http://127.0.0.1:43110/0list.bit/?Topic:1_19z3VucxwAoyQZwhmjEgA6vJ9TTp2GmGLN
some nmc is otw, keep up the great work. :)

I like ZeroCentral's layout better then Err0r.  
[1]  (http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Dt7FR5aNLkqAjmosWh8cMWzJu633GYN6u/)
Thanks for linking to the CenSearch index, your design is so much more better.
